A '''cooked porkchop''' is a [[food]] [[item]] obtained by cooking a [[raw porkchop]]. Cooked porkchops and [[steak]] restore the most [[hunger]] out of all [[stack]]able foods.

== Obtaining ==
{{see also|Tutorial:Animal farming|title1=Animal farming}}

=== Mob loot ===

{{Drop sources|Cooked Porkchop}}

=== Generated loot ===
{{LootChestItem|cooked-porkchop}}

=== Cooking ===
[[Raw porkchop]] can be [[cooked]] in a [[furnace]], [[smoker]], or [[campfire]]. Each piece of cooked porkchop removed from a furnace output slot gives 0.35 [[experience]] (22.4 experience per stack).

{{Smelting
|Raw Porkchop
|Cooked Porkchop
|0,35
}}

=== Trading ===
{{Trade sources}}

=== Villager gifts ===
Butcher villagers may give cooked porkchop to players with the [[Hero of the Village]] effect.{{only|java}}

== Usage ==
=== Food ===
{{see also|Tutorial:Hunger management|title1=Hunger management}}

To eat cooked porkchop, press and hold {{control|use}} while it is selected in the hotbar. Eating one restores {{hunger|8}} [[hunger]] and 12.8 [[Hunger#Mechanics|saturation]].

=== Wolves ===
Cooked porkchops can be used to [[breed]] and heal tamed [[Wolf|wolves]], lead them around, and make baby tamed wolves grow up faster by 10% of the remaining time.

=== Piglins ===
[[Piglin]]s pick up any cooked porkchops in their [[item (entity)|item]] form. However, they do not eat it.
